    • ReportManager

      public ReportManager() throws java.io.IOException
      Initialize the objects to get items from databases
      Throws:

    • ReportManager

      public ReportManager​(java.lang.String userFilePath, java.lang.String tradableItemFilePath, java.lang.String tradeFilePath) throws java.io.IOException
      Making the database objects with set file paths
      Parameters:
      userFilePath - the user database file path
      tradableItemFilePath - the tradable item database file path
      tradeFilePath - the trade database file path
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - issues with getting the file path

  • Method Details

    • reportUser

      public boolean reportUser​(java.lang.String fromUserId, java.lang.String toUserId, java.lang.String message) throws UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      Reporting a user
      Parameters:
      fromUserId - the user that sent the report
      toUserId - user being reported
      message - what the report is about
      Returns:
      whether or not the report successfully went through
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - user wasn't found
      AuthorizationException - report is invalid

    • getReports

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> getReports()
      Gets all reports Each element in the list is structured like such: [fromUserId, reportedUserId, message, reportId]
      Returns:
      all reports
